name: rubine
description: Bringing Microsoft's Fluent Design System to the web

scripts.build:css: node-sass scss -o css && npm run autoprefixer:css
scripts.build:docs: node-sass scss -o docs/css && npm run autoprefixer:docs
scripts.docs: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.watch: npm run build:css && onchange 'scss' -- npm run build:css
scripts.watch:docs: npm run build:docs && onchange 'scss' -- npm run build:docs
scripts.all: concurrently "npm run watch:docs" "npm run docs" "npm run build:css"

author: Studio 384
